summary: A vampire home inspired by Deepscorn Hollow in Oblivion.
descriptionHtml:
Features:
-Secret Passage entrance NE of Whiterun Stables
-Alchemy garden (mainly poison ingredients)
-Full crafting area with ore/ingot/leather/pelt storage
-Cooking area (for you non-vampire folk)
-Lore and BSR friendly shrine room
-BSR friendly cattle pen
-Secret passage directly into Whiterun for late night hunting and thievery
-Large armory with enough mannequins, weapon racks and display cases to showcase everything vanilla Skyrim has to offer
-Bedroom with more mannequins, racks, plaques and display cases to show off your own favorite personal collections of weapons and armor
-Dragon Priest Mask display area
-Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17077]Belua Sanguinare Revisited[/url]

*Requires Dawnguard DLC

Installation
Download and install with NMM (recommended) or extract the .esp into your Data folder.

Thanks to:
Thynar for helping with the secret door
Sharkwrestler for helping with the lava damage
author: xJACKTHERIPPERx and DarthXile
